scenario_text.value: Takuma, should I stay here with Miyuki?
Huh? You mean you won’t go to the factory?
Yeah. Miyuki seems a little off.

It might’ve given her a shock to be captured
by Garurumon like that.

And we don’t want her getting too
overwhelmed...right?

(I understand being concerned about Miyuki.
She’s been through some scary things.)

(But is it safe for them to stay here without
monsters to protect them?)

(Might be better to stick together. I’m sure
Haru understands that.)
(What should I say to get them to stick with us?)
What does she want?
We gotta get home.
It’s dangerous to stay!
What does she want?

I hear what you’re saying, Haru, but what
about you, Miyuki? What do you want?
She needs to stay here, and—
Sorry, Haru, but I asked Miyuki, not you.
So what do you want, Miyuki?
...To go.
What?! What do you mean?!

We’re asking a lot of her, but it’ll be for
the best if enemies appear.
I bet that’s what she’s thinking.
...Fine.

We’ll go with you since that’s our best
option... Okay?
Uh, yeah. Thanks.

(Haru’s face looks tense. He must be super
concerned about Miyuki.)
We gotta get home.

It might be tough for Miyuki now, but we
gotta all get home together somehow.
What do you mean?

No one knows what’s gonna happen where we’re
going today.

Once we’re in the factory we might suddenly
get sent back to our world.

But if that happened to us, you and Miyuki
would be left here alone.
When you put it that way...

Let’s go together, Haru. I’m worried about
you, too.
Okay, fine. We’ll do it your way.
It’s safer together.

Haru, don’t you think it’s just as dangerous
if you get attacked here on your own?

Remember what Minoru said earlier? You two
are defenseless against enemies.

The worst possible outcome would be if you
got attacked by yourselves.
Well, I can’t deny that.
It won’t be as scary with all of us together.

So it might be tough for Miyuki, but I think
it’s better to stay together today.
Okay... We’ll go.
Alright, fine. We’ll go with you.

But if there’s any danger, I’ll protect her
myself.
